title:
Wells exact sequence for automorphisms and derivations of Leibniz
  2-algebras
abstract:
In this paper, we investigate the inducibility of pairs of automorphisms and
derivations in Leibniz 2-algebras. To begin, we provide essential background
information on Leibniz 2-algebras and its cohomology theory. Next, we examine
the inducibility of pairs of automorphisms and derivations, with a focus on the
analog of Wells exact sequences in the context of Leibniz 2-algebras. We then
analyze the analogue of Wells short exact sequences as they relate to
automorphisms and derivations within this framework. Finally, we investigate
the special case of crossed modules over Leibniz algebras.
